Description:
Magnificent Family Home
CLYDE NORTH - This absolutely stunning home must be seen to be believed, immediately exuding spacious cosiness and elegance to the finest order.
The design of this home has family living at the forefront, ensuring warm family spaces but also generous sized living zones for everyone to spread out if needed.
Featuring a self-contained guest suite with ensuite, walk in robe and living space / home theatre, having guests over is made exceptionally easy.
The kitchen is at the heart of the home and boasts a 900mm oven with range hood, stone bench tops, pendant lighting, built in microwave and dishwasher. Overlooking the family room, and with access to the theatre room, everything you need is at your fingertips.
The rumpus room provides the option for formal dining and also has access to the alfresco for entertaining which will be perfect as Spring is right around the corner!
Heading upstairs, the palatial master suite is an absolute dream with parents retreat, ensuite with beautiful fittings and fixtures, dressing room and private balcony.
The three additional bedrooms upstairs are well sized, two with walk in robes and the third with a built in robe. All rooms have access to the additional family area with balcony, which is a perfect retreat for the kids to relax and have their own space. Complementing this is the full main bathroom.
Easy care gardens in the front and back finish this beautiful home off.
Features include:
- Quality fixtures and fittings
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
- Access to private balcony from master suite
- Double car garage
- 44sq living (approx.)
- 55sq under roof line (approx.)
- Large 512m2 block
Located in Melbourne's south east, Berwick Waters offers over 52 hectares of wetlands and open space.
The estate is located within close proximity to the well-equipped shopping centre at Eden Rise and local schools including St Francis Xavier College, St Catherine's Primary School and Berwick Chase Primary School.

Description:
Berwick Waters Living
A true standout from the crowd, this vibrant Fairhaven built home is packed with character and panache. Stunningly presented, with not a finger to lift, this gorgeous home is ready and waiting to brighten your day! A brilliant investment, fabulous family home or first home for a lucky buyer!
As you walk in you will be pleasantly surprised by the colour tones, quality fitting, fixtures and the floor plan. The wide entry hall flows past the formal lounge and master bedroom continuing through to the open plan kitchen, meals and family area. The large kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops, glass splashback, loads of storage space and a brilliant walk in pantry. This kitchen will delight home cooks, proud hostess' and even our budding master chefs.
Comprising of four bedrooms; the master bedroom features a walk-in robe and full en-suite with double vanity and large shower. The other three bedrooms with built in robes are located at the rear of the home with easy access to the main bathroom and separate WC. Further comforts of the home include ducted heating, evaporate cooling, blind, downlights, high ceilings and easy to maintain gardens.
Providing additional living and entertaining space, the alfresco is accessed via the living area and provides the perfect spot for hosting family parties and weekend barbeques. The home is also complimented by a good-sized yard and remote-controlled double garage.
A home of this calibre that ticks all the boxes is sure to suit most buyers and investors so get in quick! Within close proximity to all the amenities Berwick Waters has to offer everything you need is at your fingertips. Walking distance to prestigious private and public schools including Hillcrest Christian Collage and Rivercrest Christian College.
Also, few doors down from the Berwick Waters Grand Prix Playground and just a short drive to Eden Rise Shopping Centre, Casey Central Shopping Centre and Fountain Gate Shopping Centre. Public transport is within easy access to busses and Berwick train station with along with access to major arterials.
